name: Toy Terror (Uxsol, alunaa)
description:
A PS1 aesthetic-styled game for Lost Cartridge Jam 4 game jam

You play as a good robot that fights through the evil robots  that have destroyed the city, and head deep into the heart of the factory to find what's causing the robots to go bad.

Third party assets used:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/psxeffects-132368

Controller support only:

  • A : jump
  • B : throw pickup  

Made by: Uxsol, Aluna
